triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: The paper studies chatbots as conversational agents for language learning in EFL classrooms.

triples.name: Language education
triples.relevance: Language education is the primary educational domain being researched in the study.

triples.name: Dialogflow
triples.relevance: Dialogflow, Google's natural language platform, was the technology used to create the customized chatbots in this study.

triples.name: Motivation
triples.relevance: Motivation is a key psychological concept examined in the study regarding learners' engagement with chatbots.

triples.name: Affordance
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an inventory of pedagogical, technological, and social affordances that chatbots provide in language learning.

triples.name: Qualitative research
triples.relevance: Qualitative analysis of interview transcripts and interaction logs was the research methodology employed in this study.
